mapping.name: WXWYPM07_%%Y%%M%%D%%H%%m_001.csv
mapping.templet: 山东联通综合分析系统性能数据-2G.ftl
mapping.sql:
SELECT p.start_time, PROV_CODE, cfg.CITY_NAME, RELATED_BSCNAME, RELATED_BTSNAME, LAC, CI, LAC || '_' || CI, TCH_F_AVAIL_CARRIER, TCH_F_COUNT, S_AVAIL_CARRIER, SDCCH_COUNT, DL_BUSY_PDCH_MEAN, PDCH_AVAIL_MEAN, PDCH_OCCUPIEDMAXNBR, CONFIG_DEDICATED_PDCH, CONFIG_DEMAND_PDCH, ACTIVATED_PDCH, T_TRAFFIC, T_TRAFFIC_F, T_TRAFFIC_H, S_TRAFFIC, S_CALL_ATT, PAGING_ATT, SDCCH_REQUEST_HOREADY, SDCCH_ASSIGNSUCC, PAGING_SUC, SDCCH_ASSIGNSUCC_HOREADY, S_CALL_BLOCK, SDCCH_CONGESTION_IA, SDCCH_CONGESTION_HOREADY, S_CALL_SEIZE, SDCCH_OCCUPIEDSUCC_CS, SDCCH_OCCUPIEDSUCC_HOREADY, T_CALL_ATT, T_TCH_ATT, TCH_REQUEST_HOREADY, TCH_ASSIGNSUCC, TCH_ASSIGNSUCC_ASSIGN, TCH_ASSIGNSUCC_HOREADY, T_CALL_BLOCK, T_CALL_UN_BLOCK, TCH_CONGESTION_HOREADY, T_CALL_SEIZE, T_TCH_SEIZE, TCH_OCCUPIEDSUCC_HOREADY, SEND_SM_ULSDCCH, RECIEVE_SM_DLSDCCH, SEND_SM_ULTCH, SEND_SM_DLTCH, PAGING_SEND_FAIL, PDCH_ASSIGNREQ, PDCH_ASSIGNFAIL, NUM_UL_TBF_EST, TBF_SUC_UL, NUM_DL_TBF_EST, TBF_SUC_DL, UL_TBF_CONGESTION, DL_TBF_CONGESTION, GPRS_UL_LLC_THROUGHPUT_PER, GPRS_DL_LLC_THROUGHPUT_PER, GPRS_UL_LLC_FLUX, GPRS_DL_LLC_FLUX, C_ACCESS_PER_RACH, C_OK_ACC_PROC_SUC_R, T_CALL_DROP, TCH_CALLDROP, TCH_CALLDROP_RADIOREASON, TCH_CALLDROP_OTHER, CALL_TCH_DROP, TRAFFIC_DROP_PER, S_CALL_DROP, SDCCH_CALLDROP_RADIOREASON, SDCCH_CALLDROP_OTHER, CALL_ATT, CALL_SUC, GTOD_HO_REQ, GTOD_HO_SUCC, DTOG_HO_REQ, DTOG_HO_SUCC, SITE_ATT, SITE_SUC, INNABSC_HOO_REQUEST_G_G, INNABSC_HOO_SUCC_G_G, INNABSC_HOO_REQUEST_D_D, INNABSC_HOO_SUCC_D_D, INNABSC_HOO_REQUEST_G_D, INNABSC_HOO_SUCC_G_D, INNABSC_HOO_REQUEST_D_G, INNABSC_HOO_SUCC_D_G, INTERBSC_HOO_REQUEST_G_G, INTERBSC_HOO_SUCC_G_G, INTERBSC_HOO_REQUEST_D_D, INTERBSC_HOO_SUCC_D_D, INTERBSC_HOO_REQUEST_G_D, INTERBSC_HOO_SUCC_G_D, INTERBSC_HOO_REQUEST_D_G, INTERBSC_HOO_SUCC_D_G, HO_3GTO2G_SUCC_PER, HO_3GTO2G_REQ, HO_3GTO2G_SUC, HOFAIL_RETURNSUC, HOFAIL_CALLDROP, CASE WHEN NVL(T_CALL_ATT,0)=0 THEN 100 ELSE ROUND((T_CALL_SEIZE)/(T_CALL_ATT)*100,2) END OUTGOINT_CALL_PERCENT, PAGING_REQ, PAGING_SUCC, BAND_1, BAND_2, BAND_3, BAND_4, BAND_5, BSC_INTER_ATT, BSC_INTER_SUC, BSC_INTRA_ATT, BSC_INTRA_SUC, WIRE_LOAD, DL_BUSY_PDCH_MEAN FROM CFG_CITY_MAP_HQ_ID CFG, PERF_CELL_G P WHERE CFG.CITY_ID = P.CITY_ID
and p.start_time>=to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H','YYYY-MM-DD HH24') and p.start_time < to_date('%%Y-%%M-%%D %%H','YYYY-MM-DD HH24')+1/24
